faqText3: What is the basis of predictions?
faqText4: How is the integrity of the game ensured?
faqText5: What are the requirements for the participants of the game?

faqDescription1: In the game, you predict the movement of the market by indicating whether the price of an asset (MATIK cryptocurrency) will rise or fall. If your prediction is correct, you will receive a reward.
faqDescription2: To start the game, you need to connect your crypto-wallet to the platform and replenish your balance. Then you can start to predict the market movement and participate in the game.
faqDescription3: Predictions are based on data and statistics analysis, and participants can use their market knowledge or intuition to make decisions.
faqDescription4: The game runs on blockchain technology, where all predictions and results are recorded and stored on a public blockchain. This provides transparency and prevents the possibility of manipulation.
faqDescription5: In most cases, the game is available to persons who have reached the age of majority. Check the specific platform's terms and conditions for membership requirements.
faqDescription6: One type of reward is available in the game, including MATIÐ¡ tokens, which can be exchanged for real money or used inside the game for further investments and predictions
